thread.title: Google 'Person Finder' tool deployed after major South Asian earthquake
thread.title_full: Google 'Person Finder' tool deployed after major South Asian earthquake

author: Sophie Curtis
title: Google 'Person Finder' tool deployed after major South Asian earthquake
text: Google Google 'Person Finder' tool deployed after major South Asian earthquake Google deployed its Person Finder tool within hours of the earthquake hitting Afghanistan, Pakistan and India, allowing people to upload or request information about their loved ones Pakistani residents search under the rubble of a house after an earthquake hit Lower Dir Photo: Getty Images
